Package hdb.data.relational

Class RelationSchema

java.lang.Object
hdb.data.relational.RelationSchema
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class RelationSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
A RelationSchema represents the schema of a relation.
Author:
Jeong-Hyon Hwang (jhh@cs.albany.edu)
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  RelationSchema.InvalidAttributeIndexException
    An InvalidAttributeIndexException is thrown if an invalid attribute index is given to a RelationSchema.
    static class  RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException
    An InvalidRelationSchemaDefinition is thrown if a RelationSchema is defined inappropriately.

  • Constructor Details

    • RelationSchema

      public RelationSchema​(java.lang.String[] attributeNames, java.lang.Class<?>[] attributeTypes) throws RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException
      Constructs a RelationSchema.
      Parameters:
      attributeNames - the names of the attributes of the RelationSchema
      attributeTypes - the types of the attributes of the RelationSchema
      Throws:
      RelationSchema.InvalidRelationSchemaDefinitionException - if the number of attribute names and the number of attribute types do not match
